key.name: window-width-percentage
key.description: The width of the recent items menu as a percentage of the screen width.

key.name: item-count
key.description: The maximum number of recent items shown in the menu.

key.name: item-blacklist
key.summary: MIME types to hide (comma-separated; e.g. image,audio,video)
key.description: Recent items with these MIME types will not be shown.

key.name: directory-blacklist
key.description: Directories that should be ignored. One directory per line.

key.name: private-mode
key.description: If true, the recent items list is not modified.

key.name: show-deleted-files
key.description: If true, deleted items are still shown in the recent items list.
